messages.genericError: An unexpected error occurred during validation.
messages.invalidRule: The validation rule '{rule}' could not be found or is not valid.
messages.invalidType: The provided value is not a string.
messages.localeRequired: A locale option is required for this validation.
messages.validateAlpha: The field must contain only alphabetic characters.
messages.validateByteLengthMax: The field must be at most {max} bytes.
messages.validateByteLengthMin: The field must be at least {min} bytes.
messages.validateLengthExact: The field must be exactly {min} characters.
messages.validateLengthMax: The field must be at most {max} characters.
messages.validateLengthMin: The field must be at least {min} characters.
messages.validateAlphanumeric: The field must contain only alphanumeric characters.
messages.validateMatches: The field does not match the required pattern.
messages.validateMatchesInvalid: The provided RegEx pattern is invalid.
messages.validateAscii: The field must contain only ASCII characters.
messages.validateBase64: The field must be a valid Base64 string.
messages.validateNumericFormat: The field must be a valid number.
messages.validateNumericInvalid: The field contains an invalid numeric value.
messages.validateNumericRangeMin: The value must be {minRange} or greater.
messages.validateNumericRangeMax: The value must be {maxRange} or less.
messages.validateNumericRangeMinStrict: The value must be greater than {minRange}.
messages.validateNumericRangeMaxStrict: The value must be less than {maxRange}.
messages.validateNumericNotInt: The field must be a whole number (no decimals).
messages.validateNumericNotDecimal: The field must include a decimal part.
messages.validateHexadecimal: The field must be a valid hexadecimal string.
messages.validateHexColor: The field must be a valid hex color (e.g., #F00, #FF0000, #FF0000FF).
messages.validatePortRange: The field must be a valid port number (0-65535).
messages.validateNumericPositive: The field must be a positive number (greater than 0).
messages.validateNumericNegative: The field must be a negative number (less than 0).
messages.validateLowercase: The field must contain only lowercase alphabetic characters.
messages.validateUppercase: The field must contain only uppercase alphabetic characters.
messages.validateMongoId: The field must be a valid 24-character MongoId.
messages.validateMultibyte: The field must contain one or more multibyte characters.
messages.validateSurrogatePair: The field must contain one or more surrogate pair characters (e.g., emojis).
messages.validateBoolean: The field must be a valid boolean value (e.g., true, false, 1, 0).
messages.validateContains: The field must contain the text: {seed}.
messages.validateContainsMin: The field must contain '{seed}' at least {minOccurrences} time(s).
messages.validateContainsMax: The field must contain '{seed}' at most {maxOccurrences} time(s).
messages.validateIsIn: The value must be one of the following: {allowed}.
messages.validateIsBlacklistedWords: The field contains a forbidden word: {word}.
messages.validateIsWhitelisted: The field contains characters that are not allowed: {char}.
messages.validateEndsWith: The field must end with the text: {seed}.
messages.validateStartsWith: The field must start with the text: {seed}.
messages.validateEqualsTo: The field must be equal to: {comparison}.
messages.validateJSON: The field must be a valid JSON string.
messages.validateJSONNotObject: The JSON string must represent an Object or Array (primitives are not allowed).
messages.validateCurrencyInvalidType: The value must be a string.
messages.validateCurrencyMissingLocaleData: Currency validation rules for the locale are missing or invalid.
messages.validateCurrencyNegativeNotAllowed: Negative currency values are not allowed.
messages.validateCurrencyInvalidFormat: The field must be a valid currency format.
messages.validateCurrencyInvalidAmount: The numeric part of the currency value is invalid.
messages.validateCurrencyDecimalDigits: The field must have at most {expected} decimal places (found {actual}).
messages.validateCurrencySymbolRequired: The currency symbol is required but was not found.
messages.validateCreditCardProvider: The credit card provider is not supported or the format is incorrect.
messages.validateCreditCardLength: The credit card number must be between 13 and 19 digits.
messages.validateCreditCardChecksum: The credit card number is invalid (failed checksum).
messages.validateCreditCardUnknownProvider: The specified card provider '{provider}' is not supported.
messages.validateCreditCardProvierMismatch: The card number does not match the format for {provider}.
messages.validateCreditCardGeneric: The credit card number is not a valid or supported card.
messages.validateSlug: The field must be a valid slug (e.g., 'my-example-slug').
messages.validateEmailFormat: The email must be in a valid format (e.g., local-part@domain-part).
messages.validateEmailMaxLength: The email must not exceed 254 characters.
messages.validateEmailDisplayNameRequired: The email must include a display name (e.g., 'Name <email>').
messages.validateEmailDisplayNameNotAllowed: The email must not include a display name.
messages.validateEmailLocalPart: The local part of the email contains invalid characters.
messages.validateEmailDomainPart: The domain part of the email is invalid.
messages.validateEmailDomainIPNotAllowed: The email domain cannot be an IP address.
messages.validateEmailTLDRequired: The email domain must include a Top-Level Domain (e.g., .com).
messages.validateEmailHostWhitelist: The email domain is not in the allowed whitelist.
messages.validateIP: The field must be a valid IP address (IPv4 or IPv6).
messages.validateIPV4: The field must be a valid IPv4 address.
messages.validateIPV6: The field must be a valid IPv6 address.
messages.validateDate: The field must be a valid date.
messages.validateDateMin: The date must be on or after {minDate}.
messages.validateDateMax: The date must be on or before {maxDate}.
messages.validateIPRange: The field must be a valid IP CIDR range (e.g., 192.168.1.0/24 or 2001:db8::/32).
messages.validateIPRangeV4: The field must be a valid IPv4 CIDR range (e.g., 192.168.1.0/24).
messages.validateIPRangeV6: The field must be a valid IPv6 CIDR range (e.g., 2001:db8::/32).
messages.validateISOStandardRequired: The 'standard' option is required for validateISO.
messages.validateISOUnknownStandard: The ISO standard '{standard}' is not supported.
messages.validateISO_3166-1: The value must be a valid ISO 3166-1 country code (alpha-2 or alpha-3).
messages.validateISO_ISO3166-1-alpha-2: The value must be a valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code (2 letters).
messages.validateISO_ISO3166-1-alpha-3: The value must be a valid ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code (3 letters).
messages.validateISO_ISO639-1: The value must be a valid ISO 639-1 language code (2 lowercase letters).
messages.validateISO_ISO4217: The value must be a valid ISO 4217 currency code (3 uppercase letters).
messages.validateISO_8601_lenient: The value must be a valid ISO 8601 date/time (e.g., YYYY-MM-DD or YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ).
messages.validateISO_8601_strict: The value must be a strict ISO 8601 datetime (YYYY-MM-DDTHH:mm:ssZ or with offset).
messages.validateDivisibleBy: The field value must be divisible by {divisor}.
messages.validateDivisibleByDivisor: The 'divisor' argument must be a valid number other than zero.
messages.validateMACAddressFormat: The field must be a valid MAC address (or is not in an allowed format).
messages.validateJWT: The field must be a valid JSON Web Token (JWT) format.
messages.validateURL: The field must be a valid URL (e.g., http://www.example.com).
messages.validateURLProtocolRequired: The URL must include a valid protocol (e.g., http://).
messages.validateURLProtocolNotAllowed: The URL protocol used is not in the allowed list: {protocol}.
messages.validateURLTLDRequired: The URL domain must include a Top-Level Domain (e.g., .com).
messages.validateURLIPNotAllowed: The URL domain cannot be an IP address.
messages.validateURLAuthNotAllowed: The URL cannot include user authentication (user:pass@...).
messages.validateURLQueryNotAllowed: The URL cannot include query parameters (?).
messages.validatePasswordMinLength: Password must be at least {minLength} characters.
messages.validatePasswordMaxLength: Password must be no more than {maxLength} characters.
messages.validatePasswordLowercase: Password must contain at least {minLowercase} lowercase letter(s).
messages.validatePasswordUppercase: Password must contain at least {minUppercase} uppercase letter(s).
messages.validatePasswordNumbers: Password must contain at least {minNumbers} number(s).
messages.validatePasswordSymbols: Password must contain at least {minSymbols} special character(s).
messages.validateDataURI: The field must be a valid Data URI (e.g., data:text/plain;base64,SGVsbG8...).
messages.validateIMEIFormat: The field must be a valid 15-digit IMEI number.
messages.validateIMEIChecksum: The IMEI number is invalid (failed checksum).
messages.validateMimeType: The field must be a valid MIME type (e.g., application/json).
messages.validateSemVer: The field must be a valid Semantic Version (e.g., v1.2.3 or 1.0.0-alpha.1).
messages.validateHSL: The field must be a valid HSL or HSLA color (e.g., hsl(0, 100%, 50%) or hsla(0, 100%, 50%, 0.5)).
messages.validateFQDN: The field must be a valid Fully Qualified Domain Name.
messages.validateFQDNUnderscores: Underscores are not allowed in the FQDN.
messages.validateFQDNTrailingDot: Trailing dots are not allowed in the FQDN.
messages.validateFQDNWildcard: Wildcards are not allowed in the FQDN.
messages.validateFQDNLength: FQDN labels must be 63 characters or less and the total length 255 or less.
messages.validateFQDNFormat: The FQDN contains an invalid format or characters.
messages.validatePostalCode: The field must be a valid postal code.
messages.validateBIC: The field must be a valid BIC (SWIFT) code.
messages.validateIBANFormat: The field must be a valid IBAN format (e.g., correct country code or length).
messages.validateIBANChecksum: The IBAN is invalid (failed checksum validation).
messages.validateIBANWhitelist: The IBAN country code is not in the allowed whitelist.
messages.validateIBANBlacklist: The IBAN country code is blacklisted: {country}.
messages.validateISBNFormat: The field must be a valid ISBN-10 or ISBN-13 format.
messages.validateISINCodeFormat: The field must be a valid 12-character ISIN format.
messages.validateISRC: The field must be a valid 12-character ISRC code.
messages.validateISSNFormat: The field must be a valid 8-digit ISSN.
messages.validateUUID: The field must be a valid UUID.
messages.validateUUIDVersion: The field must be a valid UUID version {version}.
